nodes.text: Arlaia Zayzen was a female Human. By 3630 BBY she became known as the gladiator in the Arena Grand of Zakuul under the title "Master of Killers". During the fights in the Arena, she used multiple droid assistants, such as Medical Unit AZ-01, Combat Unit AZ-02, Advanced Combat Unit AZ-03, Assault Unit AZ-A and Assault Unit AZ-B. That year, Arlaia was put up against a newcomer known as "the Mysterious Stranger", who defeated her in the first round of the Arena fights. She sustained serious injuries and while on the brink of death, her mind was downloaded into an Isotope-5 droid called the "Doom Droid". With a new, completely robotic body, Arlaia tried to claim her revenge against the Stranger, but was defeated in round nine of the Arena fights.
Arlaia Zayzen appears in Star Wars: The Old Republic: Knights of the Fallen Empire as the first and the ninth boss of "Eternal Championship".
